Trade/Device Name(s): ReliOn Confirm Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GLUCOCARD 01 and ReliOn Confirm blood glucose monitoring systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip or palm for single patient use at home by persons with diabetes to monitor diabetes control; not intended for diagnosis or screening or use on neonates.
